Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its worth to both of us, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $950,000. I understand that this might be a substantial investment, but I am confident that the benefits it offers will justify the cost. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
